Summary

I have a strong background in extracurricular activities and academics. Serving as Vice Captain during 8th, 9th, and 10th grades, I earned the Bronze Level International Award for Young People certificate. Participating in 8 Model United Nations conferences, I secured the Outstanding Delegate award twice at Sancta Maria's MUN and also took part in the Harvard Online MUN among others.

Academically, I was the Salutatorian of my batch at Sancta Maria International School, following the Cambridge curriculum throughout my education, including time at the International British School of Alexandria in Egypt. Achieving high distinctions in IGCSE and A-Level examinations, I also scored a 98.14 percentile in the JEE Mains, showcasing the adaptability and excellence of Cambridge curriculum students in competitive exams. Currently, I am pursuing a degree in Computer Science Engineering at Chaitanya Bharati Institute of Technology, continually demonstrating success both academically and in extracurricular pursuits.
